resources.string:
Hi, my name is Bender. 

I love fish, shrimp and lobster. 

The kind that is alive and swims around in an aquarium or river, or a lake, and definitely the ocean. 
Fun fact is that I have several balls and carry them around with me wherever I go. 

I like eating fish, too. Raw fish. Grilled fish. Smoked fish. Poached fish - not so much. 

One time I went to Maine and ate fresh lobster. 
I ran around like a crazy dog and ever since it's been my favorite. 

Once, when I was vacationing in Canada, and very hungry, I got lost with my pop. 
We walked around trying to read French street signs until like magic we made it back to the apartment. 

I heard, if you give a chihuahua enough sunlight he'll turn into a sunflower. 
Or maybe just a dog with a pink belly. 

My favorite thing in the world after sunglight and fish is probably kisses. 
Kisses are quite wonderful, they make me smile in my own dog fashion. 

I also have a brother who's name is Olaf. He's ok. 
Even though he tries to steal my dinner sometimes I like to snuggle with him afterwards.
